sourcesContent:
import { memo, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/MenuCreateTour' import GeneralInformationTour from '../GeneralInformationTour' import TourSchedule from '../TourSchedule' import './CreateTour.scss' function CreateTour({ languageSelected }) { const menuCreateTour = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const [optionSelected, setOptionSelected] = useState(0) const titleLanguage = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? 'Create a new Tour' : 'Thêm Tour mới') const [tour, setTour] = useState({ code: '', name: '', category: 1, startPlace: '', endPlace: '', minAdult: 1, maxAdult: 20, minChildren: 0, maxChildren: 0, minToActive: 1, status: 1, type: 1, mode: 1, numberOfDay: 1, numberOfNight: 1, startTime: '', endTime: '', introduce: '', include: '', nonInclude: '', generalTerms: '', moreDescription: '', addressStart: '', tag: '', adultPrice: 0, childrenPrice: 0, longitude: 0, latitude: 0 }) const [tourSchedule, setTourSchedule] = useState([ { name: '', content: '', toPlace: '', serviceTour: [], openServices: false } ]) const listScreen = [, ] return (
{menuCreateTour.map((item, index) => (
setOptionSelected(index)} className={`item-nav-view-service-admin ${optionSelected == index ? 'item-nav-view-service-admin-selected' : 'item-nav-view-service-admin-unselected'} ${index === 0 && 'br-left-top'} ${index === menuCreateTour.length - 1 && 'br-right-top'}`}> {item}
))}
{listScreen[optionSelected]}
+
) } export default memo(CreateTour)
